verses.name: 1 Peter 5:9
verses.text: Whom resist stedfast in the faith, knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world.

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:10
verses.text: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:11
verses.text: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:12
verses.text: By Silvanus, a faithful brother unto you, as I suppose, I have written briefly, exhorting, and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand.
